title: Chess
creator_contributor_role: Film and Television Institute (WA), production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Immigrants - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Social conflict
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Australia - Social life and customs
abstract: Culture shock - Australian society as seen through a refugee's eyes
description: A humorous documentary style film with a dark edge to it about a refugee filmmaker's transition from the brutality of the detention centre to adjusting and adapting to the Aussie way of life, fashion and culture. Contains disturbing images. Written, directed and produced by Salam Ziusudras
